definitions.title: demonstr. pr. f.
definitions.body: this (= BH [[זׁה]]:Zinj. Têma, Cappad. Eg. Aram. [[זא]], Nab. [[דא]], Palm. [[דה]] (Lzb:264: Eph. i. 323 Cooke:26), Targum [[דא]]: v. further sub BH [[זֶה]]. The corresp. masc. is [[דְּנׇה]]);—this, Da 4:27 [[הֲלָא דָיא בַּבֶל רַבְּתָא]], Da 5:6 [[דָּא לְדָא נָֽקְשָׁן]] one striking against another, similarly Da 7:3 (cf. [[זֶה]]
